title: Budget center workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a budget center record. All transitions between phases are manually triggered.

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual

The budget center is available for selection.

To make the budget center inactive, manually transition it to the Inactive phase.

Next phase: Inactive

Metaphase: Inactive (End)

Phase Transition Description
Inactive Manual

The budget center isn't available for selection.

To make the budget center active again, manually transition it to the Active phase.

Next phase: None, or Active
